I am hitting NPE when trying to view test.rptdesign after deploying to WebSphere with the following stack

please try RC4.   and how do you deploy BIRT to WS5.1?

Tried RC4 and the same error occurs. 

Deployment to WAS 5.1 
- Package the war file into an .ear file and deploy.

Note: I was able to get the BIRT Report Viewer to run on WAS test environment 5.1 but not when it is deployed to server.

(In reply to comment #0)
Same problem happened to me.
Did u solved it?

David,
there is an old bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=135178,which seems the same issue as this one. Can you reproduce this new bug now?

WebSphere 6.1 version also uses OSGI framework and the BIRT startup code is failing with the exception that the Platform is already running. After this exception, the report engine factory is instantiated, which seems to return null and the following code causes the NullPointerException. Here is the exception stack trace.

Can reproduce this NPE in WL 9.0 using latest build. NPE is thrown because the platform can not be loaded. 

In  ReportEngineService.setEngineContext():
IReportEngineFactory factory = (IReportEngineFactory) Platform
					.createFactoryObject( IReportEngineFactory.EXTENSION_REPORT_ENGINE_FACTORY );
return null because the platform instance in PlatForm is null.
Seems that OSGI framework initialization failed in this case.
startup/shutdown the platfrom in context listener.

I have tested the latest build. It can deploy and work fine on WAS 5.1 and 6.1. The NPE didn't come. When deploy it, please make sure some settings correct: classloader type is PARENT_LAST and WAR classloader policy is APPLICATION.

There is an issue about restarting application and datasource error.
The related bug, please refer to: 
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=123976

Thanks.
